GroupBox.caption: lateral subsurface and surface model parameters
Variables used for Adaptive Stepsize to Control Runge-Kutta

Item.name: eps
Item.caption: eps (small value for fine mesh computation)

Item.name: ddt_min_riv
Item.caption: ddt_min_riv (small value for fine mesh computation)

Item.name: ddt_min_slo
Item.caption: ddt_min_slo (small value for fine mesh computation)

Label.caption: initial water content of surface soil

Enumeration.caption: Keep with default setting of RRI

Item.name: chan_capa_switch
Item.caption: Setting the threshold of minimum river width and depth

Item.name: min_num_cell_link
Item.caption: Unit channel is not formed below this cell number

Item.name: min_hr
Item.caption: Minimum river depth for sediment computation(m)

Item.name: cut_overdepo_switch
Item.caption: Enforcing overflow of sediment when river channel is filled up with sediment

Tab.name: GSD
Tab.caption: + Non-uniform GSDs for river and slope

Item.name: mixfile_fr
Item.caption: Initial grain size distribution in mixed layer (fraction)

Item.name: j_mix_dis_dep
Item.caption: Grain size distribution in deposited layer is;

Item.name: mixfile_fr_d
Item.caption: Initial grain size distribution in deposited layer (fraction)

Item.name: j_set_slo_GSD
Item.caption: Setting GSD at slope area(for debris flow and slope erosion);

Item.name: mixfile_fr_slopearea
Item.caption: GSDs at slope areas (supplied to the river)

Item.name: pwc
Item.caption: Critical volume water content for subsurface flow

Item.name: pf
Item.caption: Fine material content in the debris flow

Item.name: debris_end_switch
Item.caption: End this calculation at certain time

Item.name: T_bebris_off
Item.caption: End time for LS and DF (hour)

Item.name: slo_sedi_cal_switch
Item.caption: conducting the sediment tranport calculation at slope area

GroupBox.caption: parameters for gully and max rainfall infiltration depth

Item.name: surflowdepth
Item.caption: Minimum flow depth for slope erosion (m)

Item.name: detail_console
Item.caption: Display detailed RSR results in the console

GroupBox.caption: Division of long unit channel (Minimizing the uniform spatial variation of sediment transport process)

Item.name: merg_cell_num
Item.caption: The number of intervel cells for division

Item.name: division_sec
Item.caption: Setting the boudaries' (i,j) of division sections

Item.name: modify_dam_ele
Item.caption: Modifying dam elevation(to avoid flat bed where sediment inflows to dam cell could not be calculated)

BoundaryCondition.caption: Time Series for River Discharge at point

BoundaryCondition.name: bound_hr
BoundaryCondition.caption: Time Series for River Depth at point

BoundaryCondition.caption: Time Series for Slope Discharge at point

BoundaryCondition.caption: Time Series for Slope Depth at point
